name: Prevent Landscape Rotation
author: Arul Prasad J

sections.description:
This is a lightweight WordPress plugin that prevents landscape rotation on mobile devices and display message!

Plugin uses standard actions, filters and SweetAlert Js only.
If you love this plugin, buy me a cup of coffee.

If you need to Prevent Portrait Rotaion, Please contact me.
sections.installation:
This section describes how to install the plugin and get it working.

  1. Download and extract plugin files to a folder in your wp-content/plugin directory.
  2. Activate the plugin through the WordPress admin interface.
  3. Start using in your theme

If you have any questions or problems please make a post here: https://wordpress.org/support/plugin/prevent-landscape-rotation/
sections.changelog:
2.1

  • Confirmed working with WordPress 6.4.2
  • Fixed csrf issue
  • Minor bug fixes & security improvements.

2.0

  • Fixed conflict with Preloader Plus plugin
  • Confirmed working with WordPress 5.8.1
  • New settings page (Now you can select/change text and colors).
  • Fixed message not showing while reloading landscape page.
  • Minor bug fixes & Improvements.

1.1

  • CSS fix
  • Confirmed working with WordPress 5.6

1.0

  • Initial release.
